Class ec.transform.classparser.CodeAttribute 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.transform.classparser.Attribute
           |
           +----ec.transform.classparser.CodeAttribute
public class CodeAttribute
extends Attribute
An individual CodeAttribute in the class file. An CodeAttribute contains the byte code instructions for a method.

CodeAttribute(ClassFile, int, int, int, byte[], ExceptionRange[])
Build a CodeAttribute from arguments.

addOneLocal()
Tell the CodeAttribute to reserve space for one more local.
getByteCodes()
Return the byte code array.
getCode()
Get a Code manipulation object for this code string
getExceptionTable()
Return the exception table.
getLineNumberTableAttribute()
Return the LineNumberTableAttribute for this method's byte code.
getMaxStack()
Return the maximum stack size.
setByteCodes(byte[])
Replace the existing bytecode array with a new one.
setExceptionTable(ExceptionRange[])
setMaxStack(int)
Replace the existing maximum stack size with a new one.

CodeAttribute 
 public CodeAttribute(ClassFile classFile,
                      int nameIndex,
                      int aMaxStack,
                      int someMaxLocals,
                      byte someCode[],
                      ExceptionRange someExceptions[])
Build a CodeAttribute from arguments. The CodeAttribute has no attributes itself. Bill is likely to replace this.

getExceptionTable 
 public ExceptionRange[] getExceptionTable()
Return the exception table.

Returns:
the exception table.
getMaxStack 
 public int getMaxStack()
Return the maximum stack size.

Returns:
the maximum stack size.
getLineNumberTableAttribute 
 public LineNumberTableAttribute getLineNumberTableAttribute()
Return the LineNumberTableAttribute for this method's byte code.

Returns:
the LineNumberTableAttribute or null if there is no LineNumberTableAttribute
getByteCodes 
 public byte[] getByteCodes()
Return the byte code array.

Returns:
the byte code array.
getCode 
 public Code getCode()
Get a Code manipulation object for this code string

Returns:
a new Code manipulator to access and change the byte codes.
setByteCodes 
 public void setByteCodes(byte someByteCodes[])
Replace the existing bytecode array with a new one. All relevant lengths and sizes are also updated. You may still need to update the maximum stack size.

setMaxStack 
 public void setMaxStack(int newMaxStack)
Replace the existing maximum stack size with a new one.

setExceptionTable 
 public void setExceptionTable(ExceptionRange anExceptionTable[])
addOneLocal 
 public int addOneLocal()
Tell the CodeAttribute to reserve space for one more local. The index of that local is returned.
